
Please reschedule my Dental check-up to 2024-05-20 at 10:00.

I have found two events with the query "Dental check-up", but only one of them seems to be a dentist appointment. The event ID of the dentist appointment is '5'. 

To reschedule this event, I will use the reschedule_calendar_event function. Since the end time is not specified, I will assume it to be 1 hour after the start time, i.e., 11:00.

```

```
